title: As a professional, I have lost my passion for writing. What are my options now? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on what kind of writing you have been doing and how long have you been writing. Write in at deepadeepa@gmail.com so I can attempt to answer your question better, as the options are plenty. Opportunities come in based on where we are headed is my belief. Please write in. We’ll sort it out. However, if you choose to pass this thought, then here is my answer assuming that you have been into technical writing: Business AnalysisProduct ManagementReport WritingCreative WritingTeachingInstructional DesignMarket ResearchOptions are many, but to really answer your question tailored to your kind of personality, likes and dislikes, conveniences and feasibility, we need to understand more about 1. what kind of writing you were doing? 2. did you fall out of a passion for writing or writing only in the domain/genre that you have been doing for so long? 3. There must be a thought to back up your sudden lows towards writing... We must find that out so your new career path doesn't lead you into the same feeling. 4. Outside work what are your interests and do you have time for those? All these can help nail a choice. Best!
